name: Murder National Park
description:
You are a ISB agent at Tall Pines National Park, near Blue River, Colorado. A park that has the unfortunate nickname "Murder National Park."

When a camper gets murder while vacationing with his friends, you and your partner are on the job to find out who killed him.

Meanwhile, trouble hits the park, with the possibility that a poacher is target the Yellow-Tailed Deer living there.
